site.title: Cotton Music Player
site.description: Play and cast music from your device, Plex, Emby, Jellyfin, Subsonic, OpenSubsonic, Kodi, Samba (SMB v2/v3), WebDAV servers or supported Cloud providers (Google Drive, OneDrive, DropBox, Box, pCloud)!

home.title: Cotton Music
home.description: Play and cast music from your device, Plex, Emby, Jellyfin, Subsonic, OpenSubsonic, Kodi, Samba (SMB v2/v3), WebDAV servers or supported Cloud providers (Google Drive, OneDrive, DropBox, Box, pCloud)! Support Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, and Linux platforms, Don't wait any longer and enjoy the ultimate music experience. Download now to change the way you listen to music.

features.title: What you get with Cotton Music

item1.title: Media Source
item1.description: Supports playback from local storage, Baidu Netdisk, Alibaba Cloud, WebDAV, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox.

item2.title: Media Service
item2.description: It also supports Plex, Emby, Jellyfin, Subsonic media servers.

item3.title: Platforms
item3.description: Is compatible with Android、iOS, Windows, Mac, and Linux platforms.

item5.title: Create playlist
item5.description: Supports creating playlists, and sync cloud

item6.title: Player Theme
item6.description: Supports a wide variety of player themes

item1.title: Flyy
item1.description: Clean, ad-free, and powerful Twitter&X app.
